snippet: In order to get a government that can govern, you need to change the governing system. But you can’t change the system unless you can govern effectively.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Italian policy expert Pialuisa Bianco enumerates complexities and dangers that threaten country's already chaotic political landscape as Silvio Berlusconi makes final bid to regain his dominance; maintains Italy needs a new leader to break deadlock and build a more moderate coalition, but that hope for such an outcome is dim.
lead_paragraph: In order to get a government that can govern, you need to change the governing system. But you can’t change the system unless you can govern effectively.
